author:
John Wawrow and Stephen Whyno                                                    
                            AP
title: Commissioner raises possibility NHL won't finish regular season
description: NHL Commissioner Gary Bettman raised the possibility Tuesday of not completing the regular season in order to squeeze in the playoffs.
content:
For the first time since halting play four weeks ago, NHL Commissioner Gary Bettman raised the possibility Tuesday of not completing the regular season in order to squeeze in time to award the Stanley Cup.
Bettman also acknowledged during an interview with N… [+3464 chars]
